name: Tina Biecher
text: Love Hungry Howie's! Their cajun crust is our fav. We really enjoy the spicy kick. Good value deals too! If you have the Entertainment app you can get 3 medium for $15.

name: EPPERSON BEVERLY
text: Excellent service, delivery but pizza crust was a bit hard. Not bad though !!

name: marge bill
text: Great salad bar.  Pizza is not the best, but pretty good

name: Jesse Virgil
text: Good deals and good pizza (especially thin crust and garlic crust)

name: Flecia Bauerband
text: Pizza was average at best not something I would have again. The nacho cheese sauce was gross it was orange instead of yellow.

name: Trish
text: Great prices but the crust was kind of rubbery

name: Eric Muzyka
text: Wow, honestly just wow. The fact that this business is still even open blows my mind. The employees here do not have any.... to give. I ordered at 9:48 and got the worst customer service ever. I work in food service, and since the sign says â€¦More

name: Rick Fisher
text: Terrific prices on fine pizza. The flavored crust is great and offers a lot of variety. Spicy pizza sauce is a great choice as well. It's not the best pizza I've ever head, and it does not keep incredibly well, but it's a terrific value for the price.

name: Tyler Grany
text: Great experience, taste was great

name: Tina Pierce
text: Loved the Howie roll pepperoni ...and the antipasta salad with green olives cant wait to try the sub and pizza

name: Christian Trimino
text: Always had this pizza as a kid, best flavored crust you can find in town.

name: Scott Pendergrass
text: Always enjoy there deep dish pizza and the deep dish cheese bread..

name: Tristan Ferguson
text: We ordered our food and was told 20 minutes. Made a 20 minutes drive to get it and was another 40 minutes waiting. While waiting there was about 4-6 people waiting in the same situation. Another lady said it had been over an hour since she â€¦More

name: Zachery Bilger
text: Always have been a huge fan of Hungry Howies, they have amazing deals that make the pizza affordable and the flavored crusts set them apart from the competition. I always feel like I got more than what I paid for which is an excellent â€¦More

name: Audrey Scott
text: We love Hungry Howieâ€™s and this location is always speedy with our orders.

name: Slade Name
text: Customer service is great. Delivery was awesome and supper nice. Best pizza in town!!!!

name: Robert Clement
text: We were very disappointed last night with our experience! We tried to order the special (Large pizza, 3 toppings for $7.99) but could not get it ordered on the site. I went into Hungry Howie's and asked them if the web site was having â€¦More

name: Mariah O'Brien
text: Delivery guy smelled like smoke. Opened the pizza box and half the cheese and pepperoni was stuck to the lid. There were burnt bubbles on the pizza. Honestly didn't taste bad and the cheesy bread was great but about an hour later I ended up in the bathroom for the rest of the night. Definitely not coming here again

name: Dickens Corgi
text: The pizza was burned, especially the crust, which kinda defeats the purpose of flavor crust pizza. It came cold, which is almost impressive being burnt at the same time. I also ordered a chicken and cheese roll with buffalo sauce- didn't â€¦More

name: Andrea Tohill
text: They were fast and efficient in getting our order when we were just a walk in.

name: nikki cunningham
text: Good pizza sometimes extra greasey

name: John Einsfeld
text: Tried calling this place half a dozen times with no answer.  Took my business to Monicals across the street and they picked up right away!!

name: john hatton
text: Just order a 10" ham and cheese. Went to pick it up and they gave me an 8". I told the guy and he wanted to argue with me. Not a friendly place and horrible customer service.

name: AJ Corrales
text: Great service always! And great tasting pizza!

name: First Last
text: The pizza is NOTHNG COMPARED. To the calzones, and not the pizza calzones either. The food is good. But HIRE CONSISTENT WORKERS. IT'S THE WORKERS THAT MAKE A RESTAURANT. BECAUSE THEY MAKE THE FOOD.  I love hungry Howie's.

name: Linnie
text: I was so excited to order from the web and pick up my lunch at the location close to my work. I ordered over an hour earlyOnce there the music was blaring and although the man there saw me - he ignored me. After he processed numerous â€¦More

name: dylan larmore
text: Worst wait ever. Was told 20 minutes showed up 25 minutes later. Order still not ready. Its been 45 as Im writing this. Will listen to the other reiviews and not be going back. Shame I love hungry howies.

name: Tammy Dion
text: LOVE there Hawaiian pizza

name: Susan McKuhen
text: Best pizza ever ðŸ‘Œ

name: Amy Carlson
text: Good food

name: Brandon Cassidy
text: Subs are superb!

name: Tami Carr
text: Took over an hour for delivery. Manager argued with me in regards to my special Instructions. Poor customer service! If you want to be treated like crap go here. If you want to support a business with above and beyond customer service go elsewhere.

name: Vanessa Wilson
text: Great pizza

name: Randy Slaughter
text: Always speedy, awesome service!
